Mobiles.Name: Grey Guard
Mobiles.Long_Description: A grey torc guard stands here...trying to guard.
Mobiles.Description:
A large man in grey armor stands here smiling at you.
He has a grey torc around his neck.

Mobiles.Name: Kahul Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: Kahul Earthshaker is here examining a parchment.
Mobiles.Description: Kahul is a tall intellingent looking tanu who seems peaceful and happy.

Mobiles.Name: Leyr Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: Leyr is here examining the head of a strange beast
Mobiles.Description: This huge bulking tanu has has scars on all visible locations.  This tanu must be a great hunter and warrior and as you look into his deep set eyes you feel kindness.

Mobiles.Name: Minanonn Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: Minanonn the Heretic stands before you, looking wise and kind
Mobiles.Description: This tanu radiates wisdom and intelligence, age and kindness.

Mobiles.Name: Fian Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: Fian Skybreaker is brewing up a strange potion at the table
Mobiles.Description: This tanu seems strangely clever and could probably brew anything from tea to a potion that could make you live forever.

Mobiles.Name: Dionket
Mobiles.Long_Description: Dionket the lord healer is here waiting to heal injured friends
Mobiles.Description: Dionket smiles at you, this tanu radiates holyness.

Mobiles.Name: Aluyten Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: Aluyten Craftsmaster is here, banging something together.
Mobiles.Description: Aluyten stares at you...cant you see hes busy?

Mobiles.Name: Alberonn Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: Alberonn Mindeater stands before you....contemplating if you have a worthy brain
Mobiles.Description: >From the look of this Tanu you picture your brain on a plate, and alberonn licking his lips!

Mobiles.Name: Lady Epone Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: Lady Epone smiles at you and continues to stare into space....

Mobiles.Name: Lord Creyn Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: Lord Creyn is here searching through his piles of papers.

Mobiles.Name: Guard Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: A Silver Torc Guard halts your journey forward.
Mobiles.Description:
A large man in glinting silver armor stands here smiling at you.
He has a silver torc around his neck.

Mobiles.Name: Thagdal King Tanu
Mobiles.Long_Description: King Thagdal sits at his throne looking almighty.
Mobiles.Description: MUSCLES ALL OVER...this tanu looks like he could wipe his nose with you.

Mobiles.Name: Brede
Mobiles.Long_Description: Brede Shipspouse sits at the altar, juggling with her great mindpowers
Mobiles.Description:
Upon the face of this woman you see a mask, and a torc hangs around 
her neck...they look like they are keeping her alive.

Objects.Name: Torc
Objects.Description: A golden hoop lies here upon the floor.

Objects.Name: Mask
Objects.Description: A white mask lies here upon the floor.

Objects.Name: Katana sword
Objects.Description: A golden Katana lies upon the floor

Objects.Name: dragonquest666
Objects.Description: A Copper Dragonstone lies here gleaming.

Rooms.Name: Castle Gateway Entrance
Rooms.Description:
Before you stands a marvelous castle, the walls are made of polished marble gleaming in the light.  Statues of warriors and priests stand either side of the path.  As you approach you notice they are of an unfamiliar race.
The portcullis is raised.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the Castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice fine tapestries depicitng a great battle.  The floor is carpeted with fine emerald green velvet.

Rooms.Name: Main Hall Intersection
Rooms.Description:
You stand in the main foyer of the ground floor, hanging from the ceiling is a diamond chandalier, unfortunatley you are unable reach it allthough you try many ways.
To the north there is a door with a plaque.
Huge archways lie east and west.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the Castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice fine tapestries depiciting a great battle.   The floor is carpeted with a fine emerald green carpet.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice fine tapestries depicitng a great battle.  The floor is carpeted with a fine emerald green velvet.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the Castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice fine tapestries depiciting a great battle.  The floor is carpeted with a fine emerald green velvet.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice tapestries depicting a great battle.  The floor is carpeted with a fine emerald green velvet.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the Castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice tapestries depicting a great battle.  The floor is carpeted with a fine emerald green velvet.

Rooms.Name: Spiraling Staircase
Rooms.Description: Here stands a spiraling staircase that reaches higher than the eye can see.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the Castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice fine tapestries depiting a great battle.  The floor is carpeted with a fine emerald green velvet.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the Castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice fine tapestries depicting a great battle.  The floor is carpeted with a fine emerald green velvet.

Rooms.Name: Leyr's Study
Rooms.Description:
Lining the walls are many deadly looking weapons.  You see many caskets each containg several decapitated heads of foul creatures you have never seen before.
Leyr must obviously be a great hunter.

Rooms.Name: Minanonn's Study
Rooms.Description: You enter the study of Minanonn the Heretic, a Tanu said to be as wise as the earth itself, a planet of which he did not originate from.

Rooms.Name: Fian Skybreaker's Quarters
Rooms.Description:
As you enter the room you notice strange aromas.
There are potions, vials, tubes and bottles containing various coloured fluids.

Rooms.Name: Hallway Inside the Castle
Rooms.Description: Along this hallway you notice fine tapestries depicting a great battle.  The floor is carpeted with a fine emerald green velvet.

Rooms.Name: Spiraling Staircase
Rooms.Description: Here stands a spiraling staircase that reaches higher than the eye can see.

Rooms.Name: Kahul Earthshaker's Study
Rooms.Description: This room contains many books, scrolls, manuals and scripts.  There is a bookcase in the corner that seems to contain an infinte amount of literature.

Rooms.Name: Spiraling Staircase
Rooms.Description: Here stands a long winding staircase downwards.

Rooms.Name: Intersection in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing at a junction in the hallway.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, many chairs align the wall, you also note the familiar tapestries hanging upon the wall.

Rooms.Name: Intersection in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You stand at an intersection, you can hear hammering from your the east, someone sounds hard at work.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, many chairs align the wall and familiar tapestries hang upon it.

Rooms.Name: Intersection in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You stand at an intersection, at this junction you have a choice of directions...to the south you think you can see a huge staircase.

Rooms.Name: Spiraling Staircase
Rooms.Description: Here stands a huge spiraling staircase that reaches upwards for what seems eternity.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, chairs are evenly spaced along the sides of the hallway.

Rooms.Name: Intersection in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are at the end of the hallway, you can either turn left or turn right.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, more chairs are evenly spaced along the sides of the hallway.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, to your right you can hear faint murmurs.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, chairs are evenly spaced along the sides of the hallway, the murmurs are getting louder.

Rooms.Name: Dionket's Chapel
Rooms.Description:
Inside the chapel you feel peaceful.
An ancient looking tanu stands at the alter reciting words from a crumbling tablet.
He mumbles quietly to the congragation.

Rooms.Name: Aluyten Craftmaster's Workshop
Rooms.Description: As you enter the room you sense magical forces working about you.  In the centre of the workshop is a table with a strange globe mounted firmly upon it.  The globe is pulsing with energy.

Rooms.Name: Alberonn Mindeater's Laboratry
Rooms.Description: Earghhhhh, the stench of roting brains makes you feel sick.  All sorts of disection equipment is lying upon a table, awaiting use.  Along the walls many shelves hold jars containing preserved brains.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, many chairs align the wall and familiar tapestries hang upon it.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, many chairs align the wall and familiar tapestries hang upon it.

Rooms.Name: Corridor in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a well furnished corridor, many chairs align the walls and familiar tapestries hang upon it.

Rooms.Name: Intersection in the Hallway
Rooms.Description: You stand at an intersection, at this junction you notice that the two directions lead to the quarters of more Tanu.

Rooms.Name: Lady Epone's Chamber
Rooms.Description:
This is the private chamber of Lady Epone.
You feel calm and civil though strangely curious due to the strange aura emitted by this room.

Rooms.Name: Lord Creyn's Office
Rooms.Description: This room is just like an office, be it an untidy one.  Papers and notes are scattered all over the desks and chairs, the occupant seriosly needs to organise himself.

Rooms.Name: Spiraling Staircase
Rooms.Description: Here stands a huge staircase, spiraling down into the tower.

Rooms.Name: Guard Post 1
Rooms.Description: Here stand the Silver Torc Guard, they are awesome in physique and look well trained in their weapons.

Rooms.Name: Guard Post 2
Rooms.Description: Here stand the second group of Silver Torc Guard, as awesome as the first.

Rooms.Name: Guard Post 3
Rooms.Description: Here stand the third group of silver torc guard, as magnificent as the others.

Rooms.Name: Before the Throne
Rooms.Description: To the north you can picture a mighty figure upon a throne, do you venture forth?

Rooms.Name: The Throne Room
Rooms.Description:
Before you is King Thagdal's Throne.
The throne looks to be made of pure gold and has what looks to be an infinite number of jewells of every colour, what a prize it would be if you could kill the occupant then move the huge mass.

Rooms.Name: Portal to Brede
Rooms.Description:
You feel a shiver up your spine as your molecules seem to disperse to all corners of this portal then reform again in the centre.
Ahead of you you now notice the room shiver and reform too, but this time with no walls.

Rooms.Name: Room Without Walls
Rooms.Description:
This room radiates peace harmony and calm.
Strangely it appears to have no walls but you still feel enclosed, maybe by a force.
In the centre of the room lies an altar
